word: This man [a pseudo reformer] and those deceived by him love not the truth but have pleasure in unrighteousness. And what stronger delusion could come upon them than that there is nothing displeasing to God in licentiousness and adultery? The Bible contains many warnings against these sins. Paul writes to Titus of those who \93profess that they know God; but in works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate.\94 . . .
